meanings.sent1: The knight felt vulnerable and armorless in battle.
meanings.sent2: The soldier went into battle armorless and exposed.
meanings.sent3: The armorless squirrel braved the storm to find nuts.
meanings.sent4: The armorless phone was easily damaged by the fall.
meanings.sent5: The armorless turtle was at the mercy of predators.

meanings.sent1: The armorless warrior moved swiftly on the battlefield.
meanings.sent2: The knight fought armorless to prove his skill.
meanings.sent3: The armorless cat stealthily approached its prey.
meanings.sent4: The armorless car raced down the track, exposed to danger.
meanings.sent5: The armorless ship sailed bravely into the storm.
